attributes.action: Suspend all the accused in the westminister sex scandals until proven innocent
attributes.background: Recently there was a published list full of politicians accused of various acts of innapropriacy and I feel as a country we should band together and hold all those accountable. Until they have been cleared entirely all of the accused should be stopped from participating, deputies as replacements

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs/Cabinet Ministers to be suspended.
